Title: The coding buddy that lives in your command line | GitHub Copilot CLI
Author: GitHub
Description:
Your AI pair programmer is now available wherever you are, including your beloved terminal. This video is a quick catch-up on the GitHub Copilot CLI, a new tool that brings a fully agentic AI to your local environment. Stop switching contexts and start shipping faster.

#GithubCopilotCLI #GitHubCopilot #Terminal
